name: UP898451 - Dragons vs Aliens
description:
The exe file is called Astroid cause I cant spell. Try running the .exe, and if that doesn't work, use the browser version.

My twist on the classic asteroids game. Click to fire turret, wasd/arrow keys to move and space to shoot fireball. Esc to go to menu.

Music is mine, sound effects were free downloads on unity asset store, sprites are mine.

I followed Unity Tutorials - Asteroids by scripting is fun on youtube:

Hope you enjoy it!

Hint: Click on the title on the menu (If you are using the .exe)
